website_summaries.verdict: This stemless glass is BPA-free, lead-free, and made in the USA.
pros: Made with a ClearFire formula for extra strength and shine, this stemless design is shaped to accentuate a variety of white wines
The design also makes it useful for other beverages, and less likely to break
cons: If holding the glass for any length of time, the wine can warm up

customer_reviews.title: A great basic wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, all around wine glasses. I got this set based on the New York Times recommendation and I couldn't be happier with them. They have a nice amount of weight to them but a thin rim and a pleasing grip. The shape is pretty good, if not perfect, for most the aromatics of most wines to come through.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Thick and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the recommendation of Wirecutter. First, one glass arrived broken, there was no protection except for some thin cardboard separators inside a regular cardboard box. These glasses immediately felt think and heavy, similar to something you’d get in a byob restaurant. I usually like Riedel but being extra clumsy, I was hoping for something a tad more sturdy while still being stylish. These were indeed sturdy but looked cheap. So in the end, I’m glad they arrived broken so I was easily able to return them and get my money back. Would recommend if you needed to buy in bulk for a restaurant or event or if you like your glasses thick and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these wine glasses. I ordered them after reading a NY Times article, “one wine glass to rule them all,” and they did not disappoint. Sturdy glasses that look great, and allow for an enhanced wine drinking experience at a great price. One glass, unfortunately, arrived with a chip in it. I contacted the seller notifying them of the damaged product. I received an immediate response, and had a replacement within a week! You can’t go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks great. More fragile than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look. The top has a nice tulip shape and they are great for any kind of wine. They are pretty deep and the opening is too narrow for me to fit my fingers into the bottom to hand wash, so I've been using a baby bottle brush to get the whole thing properly cleaned. They are also very tall and just barely fit in my cabinets. My husband broke one the first time he tried to wash it. It tapped the side of the granite counter and just shattered. I'm still pretty pleased with them. I hope the others hold up better. The glass is nice and thin, and really lets the wine shine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with these glasses. They were mentioned very favorably in many wine publications as reviewers most favorite wine glass. I didn’t expect too much for the price but I’m happily surprised. They have a generous thin bowl and are really lovely. The stems are a bit thicker than more expensive glasses but I consider this an asset. They are very nice and a fabulous value.
customer_reviews.author: SC Garden Gnome

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these glasses and as et of Reidels to compare. The Reidels were thinner (a plus) but only by a bit. The Libbey's were beautiful, thin and half the price so we picked them. Too soo to talk about durability, but I am a clutz and we chose the Libbey's in part because they were described as more durable by Wirecutter.
customer_reviews.author: PetersP

customer_reviews.title: Recommended With No Reservations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three boxes of the 16oz wine glasses, as well as three boxes of the matching iced beverage glasses, and there wasn't a single broken glass out of the 24. The glasses themselves are very nice, with thin rims, narrow stems, no seems or defects that I can see, and they all survived a cycle in the dishwasher. I'd say they're easily worth the price. They are a bit on the tall side, and though they fit in my cabinets I can imagine that could be an issue for some. I'd advise measuring before you order if you have doubts.
customer_reviews.author: John Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, and although we have not been the most gentle with the glasses, they have held up well, through dishwashers, and clinking on the side of the counter, and other abuse. I do believe other glasses would have broken by now...
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: A fine daily drinker!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent daily use glasses. I encountered these at a winery and have enjoyed them since. They are incredibly well packed, eco friendly for recycling of the materials. I’ll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bridge

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. I usually go through wine glasses with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I usually go through wine glasses with the velocity of an elephant in a china shop, but so far these have stood up to me. They are a very nice size; that sweet spot between looking really good because they're big and being light enough that they're easy to pick up. Plus there's plenty of room in them to swirl and sniff the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Chipped
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased these glasses as a gift for my boyfriend back in May. But if you really must know, they were actually replacements for all of his glasses I had broken. Lol Anyway, the low stars are because one of the glasses came with a chip on the base. Unfortunately we just opened the box up to wash and use today and of course we have missed the window to return the item. We should have inspected them when they came. So although they are nice glasses, I am giving fewer stars for the condition of the glass out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sceng

customer_reviews.title: Best Wine Glass For the Money, PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: I've used just about every crystal wine glass produced in the world today including the entire line by Riedel. Sure you can buy better wine glasses. However, for the price... Buy these, and drink any type of wine from these glasses (white, red, blush, etc...) It will improve the wine every time. Don't believe me? Try the same wine in your normal glass and this glass side by side. EVERY time I've had someone do this test, they have purchased these glasses. EVERY TIME! Enough said...
customer_reviews.author: Simon Durkee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking - but lacking quality control; one glass had a significant imperfection in foot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after lots of great online reviews, including by several prominent food and wine publications. 4 pack of glasses survived shipping unscathed, but were very dirty - covered in dust and two had some type of black gunk on the foot (though came off with cleaning). While the glasses are attractive, I’m annoyed that at this price point one had a fairly significant flaw in the glass. It looked like something was pressed against the foot prior to the glass hardening, leaving a streak and a noticeable indentation.
customer_reviews.author: Dorvs

customer_reviews.title: updating: Glass broke in my hand, but company more than made good
customer_reviews.text: I previously wrote about my frustration that Libbey had promoted the glasses' durability and called them "dishwasher safe." I only hand-wash wine glasses, but one of these broke in my hand as I was hand-drying it. So it seemed like improper promotion. To my surprise, the company wrote back and said it would send a full replacement set of 4. And they did! So kudos to Libbey for its responsiveness. To be sure, don't put these glasses into the dishwasher. But I drink a lot of wine, and I like these glasses a lot. And again, the company won back my support.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Andrews

customer_reviews.title: The best everyday wine glass for the money
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I have begun drinking wine regularly for the last 6 months or so and had been looking for an upgrade to enhance the "experience". These certainly fit the bill. No, they aren't as thin or elegant as the $200 wine glasses you can find. However, these glasses are large enough to enhance aromas and allow for aeration. Wine is noticeably different in these glasses than some cheaper options. They are priced so I won't panic if one breaks and they are dishwasher safe. Great for company and to have a snobby wine tasting party.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tolsma

customer_reviews.title: This wine snob approves of these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for these glasses but now I know why all the major publications recommend these. They are very nice glasses. Thin and light. Perfect everyday wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these glasses for my apartment. I was looking for nice glasses that were thin and perfect for wine tasting. I found exactly what I was looking for! They are stunning in person, relatively easy to clean, and durable. I tend to be clutzy when cleaning and I accidentally tapped one of the glasses on the edge of the sink. It did not break and I was honestly quite shocked! Mild downside was that they were a little smaller than I thought they would be however this was a non issue for me! They are great glasses if you enjoy wine tasting and you aren’t looking for goblet style wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! Thin yet durable glass. They feel well balanced in your hand as well. More suitable for reds, but you could get away with whites as well. I do prefer my Reidels, but for the price, these are my go to glasses. I once dropped one on my ceramic tile floor, only to watch it bounce three times before coming to a stop. The balance between elegance, durability, and price is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I received these undamaged. They are light weight and very nice glasses. I had to replace several with a rounded rim which is not ideal for wine. These are thin with no thick rim on the top...so happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: gorgegal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, elegant any type of wine glass!  Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Price for quality is great. Tall, great shape, elegant and expensive looking. Lots of compliments from guests on first use. Stop looking elsewhere. I previously bought another set, with the same intended use. They were so awful, I didn't want to even use them myself, let alone with guests. Highly recommended. With this option, there's no need to pay through the nose to have nice things, and I don't mind spending money for nice things.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Needham

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Thursday for a special Saturday dinner
customer_reviews.text: As one might think is required, but the thick cardboard separated for each glass exceeded packaging expectation. Cross glassware off as another thing you can’t easily order online. Libby glass is as good as it gets before crossing into crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Tried with 2 other sellers who were claiming to be selling the Libbey Signature Kentfield Estate wine glasses after reading the great reviews on them. Both sets came in with rough drinking edges and no brand packaging. Decided it was best to buy right from Libbey and I was right! Glasses came beautifully and effectively packed for shipping and the quality is excellent, as expected. They will be the workhorses of our collection, and so far they have performed perfectly! Great value, too!
customer_reviews.author: Little Annie

customer_reviews.title: Break easily, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Garbage.They Break easily. Shaking these out in the sink after rinsing, they broke at the stem and shattered . The stem broke on 3 of 8 glasses in only 2 months. No way to contact the manufacture . Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Minor defect in one glass, excellent customer support from Libbey.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on a review from another site. Love the glasses. Elegant shape and feel for the price. Perfect for casual use or entertaining. One glass did have a minor imperfection. I contacted Libbey and they quickly and easily replaced the item without question. I'd highly recommend the glasses for the value and for the customer service of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Former Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a beach rental. I was surprised at how nice they feel. Like a wine glass at a good restaurant, but cheap price. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: These glasses break very easily

We have glasses that we have used for decades without any issues. So, the problem is with the glasses. Stay away and save yourself from making a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Used for wine. Glasses are very elegant and a pleasure to drink from. Because of the long stem, you have to be careful when washing. This is my second order and I am very pleased. Thanks Libby Robert
customer_reviews.author: Robert Felson

customer_reviews.title: This is an attractive wine glass which has a nice heft in the hand
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive wine glass which has a nice heft in the hand. I love that there are no seams on the stem - it smoothly transitions from base to stem to bowl. The rim is on the thinner side, but it's smooth and non-distracting. Best of all - dishwasher safe.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses (3/4)

customer_reviews.title: Cheers to these wine glasses🍷

customer_reviews.title: Great for any wine other than red

customer_reviews.text: These are fine glasses. I have no idea if they are the best all around glasses like the NYT says. Its just subjective. However...Be aware the glasses have hugely long stems. customer_reviews.title: It's a normal wine glass.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice wine glass, but I prefer my wine glasses to be smaller (hold less wine). Also, it is not shatter proof - it seems to have the same fragility as any other wine glass. I bought these wine glasses because they were highly rated online for the price, but I didn't really see the benefits that had earned such a marketable reputation (e.g., the shape is supposed to allow the aroma of the wine to fill the headspace and thus, enhances the overall flavor and wine drinking experience). Probably will not buy again as there are many other types of wine glasses to try and this one was not all that impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: The perfect home wine glass
customer_reviews.text: We've been replacing our glassware over time, and we bought two sets of these wine glasses to replace a hodgepodge of different glasses we'd collected over the years. We've had them for several weeks now, and we couldn't be more pleased. Sturdy enough to run through the dishwasher, large enough for an adequate serving, small enough to fit neatly in the rack in most bar cabinets. Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Yep

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great wine glasses. They're not too thick but still durable. I love that they're made in the US and are absolutely worth the medium price point. I looked for a long time for wine glasses and am glad I jumped on these.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses and reasonably priced. They were a little taller than I thought they would be. I bought 12 but I was missing 2 and one was broken. Libby sent 4 glasses to replace the 3 which was very nice. Next time I would go for a shorter glass.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses; have purchased many sets.
customer_reviews.text: I first read about these glasses on Wirecutter. At the time, they were out of stock on Amazon but eventually they came back in stock. I replaced all of my crappy wineglasses with 3 sets of these. The best part is the rim of the glass. It's smooth and thin, unlike the inexpensive glasses you get for $2 a piece. The size is perfect and the bowl is a great size for red wine. These will be my go-to for many years.

product_meta.title: Libbey Signature Kentfield Estate All-Purpose Stemless Wine Glasses, Set of 4
product_meta.description:
Color:Stemless Wine Glasses (20.5 oz)

Perfect for everyday sipping and intimate dinner parties, this set of four stemless wine glasses from the Libbey Signature Kentfield family works well with your favorite wines — whether red, white, or pink. These all-purpose wine glasses feature a balanced, stable stemless base for more sipping and less tipping. This set includes four 20.5-ounce wine glasses.

Crafted with state-of-the-art Libbey ClearFire glass composition, these stemless wine glasses feature thinner walls that offer a balance of superior clarity and strength and a laser-cut rim for an even, beadless, chip-resistant edge.

They're a great match for any wine you plan on pouring, from Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Shiraz, and Zinfandel to Chardonnay, Riesling, Pinot Grigio, and Sauvignon Blanc. These versatile glasses can also be used for serving chilled water, cocktails, and more.

Bring them home for yourself, or present as a gift at weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, or any celebration. Each stemless wine glass measures 4.8 inches tall and 3.7 inches round. Dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup.

Made lead-free and BPA-free in the USA, Libbey's Signature glassware family is brilliantly designed and manufactured via a new innovative ClearFire glassmaking process that ensures unprecedented brightness, clarity, and resilience. The Kentfield collection brings a perfectly balanced, versatile design with a classically elegant shape to celebrations and everyday casual get-togethers.

Celebrate This! with Glassware from Libbey
If you’ve ever sipped from a glass, odds are you’ve already met Libbey. We rank as the top glassware manufacturer in the Americas and one of the largest tableware suppliers in the world. As the runaway leader, we are setting new standards for stability, strength, and growth opportunity. We believe every occasion — big and small — is an opportunity to celebrate life.
